about_the_game:
This is the official artbook for Ziggy's Cosmic Adventures! The book is packed full of art, concept art, and developer notes, over 150 pages of content, all in 4k!
The artbook will be placed in your Ziggy folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Ziggy's Cosmic Adventures\
